'''''Vinyar Tengwar 14''''' is the fourteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|13|15}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Uglúk and Grishnákh" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''
* "''[[The War of the Ring]]'': A Linguistic Review" — Carl F. Hostetter
* "The Elves at Koivienéni: A New Quenya Sentence"✫ — Christopher Gilson and Patrick H. Wynne
* "The Fifth Battle" — Tom Loback

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
